revised_title: Anatomy of Fishes: The Air-Bladder and Weberian Ossicles in the Siluridae
tldr: This study investigates the air-bladder and Weberian ossicles in the Siluridae family of fish, providing a detailed analysis of their morphology and the skeletal modifications associated with the air-bladder. The authors propose a new nomenclature for the Weberian ossicles to avoid confusion with mammalian auditory ossicles and provide a comprehensive overview of the structures and their functions in the Siluridae family.
